description: Wordplay connecting courtroom language and humor.
title: Legal Humor
n_1: Comedian stands in a courtroom, facing a stern judge.
c2_1: Do they hold up in court?
n_2: Comedian smirks, ready with his punchline.
n_3: Judge cracks a smile, intrigued by the wit.
c2_3: That’s a first in this courtroom!
n_4: Both share a laugh, lightening the courtroom’s mood.
c1_4: I’ll take that as a win!
